backend/main.mo: Manages user approvals, access control, profiles, notifications, and approval requests with a name-based identifier system.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a frontend update to replace deprecated requestApproval with requestApprovalWithName.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized descriptions for all major frontend files and their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light and dark mode color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app component routing users through login, pending approval, or main app based on identity and approval status.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Guard component that restricts access to admin-only routes and redirects non-admin users.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccessStatus.ts: Hook fetching approval and admin status using React Query with refetch behavior on mount and focus.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and refreshing the authenticated backend actor and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, approvals, and roles via backend actor methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccessPendingScreen.t: Handles user access request submission, localStorage persistence, and pending state UI.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Displays pending and approved users, allowing admins to approve, reject, or manage roles.
frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx: Shows main user dashboard with module navigation, profile setup, announcements, and admin access.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Renders the login screen and triggers Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/modules/FrieslandFung: Placeholder module page with a header and basic informational content.
frontend/src/pages/modules/LandVanOns.ts: Placeholder module page with themed header, background, and text, including navigation back to home.
frontend/src/pages/modules/Pottle.tsx: Placeholder module page for Pottle with header, icon, background, and a back-to-home button.

frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing parameters from the URL or session.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with extended color system, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, known issues, and architectural notes related to access control and module pages.
